techniques.title: GitHub
techniques.description: A web-based Git repository hosting service.
techniques.detail: GitHub is a development platform inspired by the way you work. From open source to business, you can host and review code, manage projects, and build software alongside millions of other developers.

techniques.title: Stack Overflow
techniques.description: A question and answer site for professional and enthusiast programmers.
techniques.detail: Stack Overflow is the largest, most trusted online community for developers to learn, share their programming knowledge, and build their careers.

techniques.title: CodePen
techniques.description: An online community for testing and showcasing user-created HTML, CSS and JavaScript code snippets.
techniques.detail: CodePen is a social development environment for front-end designers and developers. It's the best place to build and deploy a website, show off your work, build test cases, and find inspiration.

techniques.title: JSFiddle
techniques.description: An online community for testing and showcasing user-created HTML, CSS and JavaScript code snippets.
techniques.detail: JSFiddle is an online community for testing and showcasing user-created HTML, CSS and JavaScript code snippets. It's a great tool for quickly testing and sharing code snippets with others.

techniques.title: CodeSandbox
techniques.description: An online code editor and prototyping tool for building web applications.
techniques.detail: CodeSandbox is an online code editor and prototyping tool for building web applications. It's a great tool for quickly testing and sharing code snippets with others.

techniques.title: Glitch
techniques.description: A collaborative coding platform for building web apps.
techniques.detail: Glitch is a collaborative coding platform for building web apps. It's a great tool for quickly testing and sharing code snippets with others.

techniques.title: Repl.it
techniques.description: An online code editor and compiler for building web applications.
techniques.detail: Repl.it is an online code editor and compiler for building web applications. It's a great tool for quickly testing and sharing code snippets with others.

inspirations.title: MindClip
inspirations.description: A simple and easy-to-use note-taking app.
inspirations.detail: MindClip is a simple and easy-to-use note-taking app that helps you organize your thoughts and ideas. It's perfect for students, teachers, and professionals who need to keep track of their notes and ideas.
